25 public class DLVDesktopServiceTest {
26 
30  @BeforeClass
31  public static void setUpBeforeClass() throws Exception {
32  }
33 
37  @AfterClass
38  public static void tearDownAfterClass() throws Exception {
39  }
40 
42  private final CountDownLatch lock = new CountDownLatch(1);
43 
44  private final int N = 9;
45 
46  private final int[][] sudokuMatrix = { { 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 7, 0, 9, 0 }, { 0, 3, 0, 0, 2, 0, 0, 0, 8 }, { 0, 0, 9, 6, 0, 0, 5, 0, 0 },
47  { 0, 0, 5, 3, 0, 0, 9, 0, 0 }, { 0, 1, 0, 0, 8, 0, 0, 0, 2 }, { 6, 0, 0, 0, 0, 4, 0, 0, 0 }, { 3, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0 },
48  { 0, 4, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 7 }, { 0, 0, 7, 0, 0, 0, 3, 0, 0 } };
49 
50  private AnswerSets answerSets;
51 
57  public String getPath() {
58 
59  final String OS = System.getProperty("os.name").toLowerCase();
60  final StringBuffer path = new StringBuffer();
61 
62  path.append(".." + File.separator + ".." + File.separator + "test-resources" + File.separator + "asp" + File.separator + "executables");
63  path.append(File.separator);
64  path.append("dlv");
65  path.append(File.separator);
66 
67  if (OS.indexOf("win") >= 0)
68  path.append("dlv.mingw.exe");
69  else
70  if (OS.indexOf("mac") >= 0)
71  path.append("dlv.i386-apple-darwin.bin");
72  else
73  if (OS.indexOf("nux") >= 0) {
74  final String arch = System.getProperty("os.arch");
75  if (arch.equals("x86_64"))
76  path.append("dlv.x86-64-linux-elf-static.bin");
77  else
78  path.append("dlv.i386-linux-elf-static.bin");
79  }
80 
81  System.out.println("Full path: " + path.toString()); // debug string
82 
83  return path.toString();
84 
85  }
86 
90  @Before
91  public void setUp() throws Exception {
92  }
93 
94  @Test
95  public void sudokuTest() {
96  try {
97 
98  final Handler handler = new DesktopHandler(new DLVDesktopService(getPath()));
99 
100  final InputProgram inputProgram = new ASPInputProgram();
101  for (int i = 0; i < N; i++)
102  for (int j = 0; j < N; j++)
103  if (sudokuMatrix[i][j] != 0)
104  inputProgram.addObjectInput(new Cell(i, j, sudokuMatrix[i][j]));
105 
106  inputProgram.addFilesPath(".." + File.separator + ".." + File.separator + "test-resources" + File.separator + "asp" + File.separator + "sudoku");
107 
108  handler.addProgram(inputProgram);
109 
110  handler.startAsync(o -> {
111 
112  if (!(o instanceof AnswerSets))
113  return;
114 
115  answerSets = (AnswerSets) o;
116 
117  lock.countDown();
118 
119  });
120 
121  lock.await(50000, TimeUnit.MILLISECONDS);
122 
123  Assert.assertNotNull(answerSets);
124 
125  Assert.assertTrue("Found error in the Plan\n" + answerSets.getErrors(), answerSets.getErrors().isEmpty());
126 
127  if (answerSets.getAnswersets().size() == 0)
128  return;
129  final AnswerSet as = answerSets.getAnswersets().get(0);
130  for (final Object obj : as.getAtoms()) {
131  final Cell cell = (Cell) obj;
132  sudokuMatrix[cell.getRow()][cell.getColumn()] = cell.getValue();
133  }
134 
135  for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
136  for (int j = 0; j < N; j++) {
137  System.out.print(sudokuMatrix[i][j] + " ");
138  if (sudokuMatrix[i][j] == 0)
139  Assert.fail("Number not valid");
140  }
141  System.out.println();
142  }
143  } catch (final Exception e) {
144  Assert.fail("Exception " + e.getMessage());
145  }
146 
147  }
148 
152  @After
153  public void tearDown() throws Exception {
154  }
155 
156 }
